Title: The Sullied Banner
Description:
So long as there has been magic, there have been those willing to utilize it for nefarious ends.

I am not certain what grievances these rogue mages hold that has prompted Surigosa to chase them down, but I am inclined to trust her judgment on the matter. Let us go to her, $n; perhaps we can solve this rogue mage problem and convince Surigosa to return in a single turn.
